headline.main: Former Detroit City Council President Pleads Guilty to Sex Crimes
headline.print_headline: Former Detroit City Council President Pleads Guilty to Sex Crimes

docs.snippet: A former Detroit City Council president pleaded guilty on Wednesday to charges stemming from a sexual relationship with a teenage boy, according to his lawyer, capping the three-year political downfall of the once-powerful local politician....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former Detroit City Council president pleaded guilty on Wednesday to charges stemming from a sexual relationship with a teenage boy, according to his lawyer, capping the three-year political downfall of the once-powerful local politician.

headline.main: Previously Unknown Ingmar Bergman Script to Be Into Turned Movie
headline.print_headline: Previously Unknown Ingmar Bergman Script to Be Into Turned Movie

docs.snippet: A previously unknown script written by Ingmar Bergman for a collaboration between him, Italy's Federico Fellini and Japan's Akira Kurosawa is being turned into a movie by Swedish director Suzanne Osten, daily Dagens Nyheter reported on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A previously unknown script written by Ingmar Bergman for a collaboration between him, Italy's Federico Fellini and Japan's Akira Kurosawa is being turned into a movie by Swedish director Suzanne Osten, daily Dagens Nyheter reported on Wednesday.

headline.main: Lavezzi Returns to Argentina Squad After Dybala Injury
headline.print_headline: Lavezzi Returns to Argentina Squad After Dybala Injury

docs.snippet: Argentina have recalled forward Ezequiel Lavezzi for next month’s South American World Cup qualifiers against Brazil and Colombia despite him not playing since June....
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina have recalled forward Ezequiel Lavezzi for next month’s South American World Cup qualifiers against Brazil and Colombia despite him not playing since June.

headline.main: Israel Recalls UNESCO Ambassador in Protest at Jerusalem Resolutions
headline.print_headline: Israel Recalls UNESCO Ambassador in Protest at Jerusalem Resolutions

docs.snippet: Israel on Wednesday recalled its ambassador to UNESCO for consultations after the U.N. culture body adopted a second resolution in two weeks that Israeli leaders said ignored Judaism's connection with one of Jerusalem's holiest sites....
docs.lead_paragraph: Israel on Wednesday recalled its ambassador to UNESCO for consultations after the U.N. culture body adopted a second resolution in two weeks that Israeli leaders said ignored Judaism's connection with one of Jerusalem's holiest sites.

headline.main: Warning of ISIS Plots Against West, U.S. Plans Assault on Raqqa
headline.print_headline: U.S. Planning to Start Assault on Raqqa Soon

docs.snippet: Senior military officials said the fight would begin within weeks to retake the de facto ISIS capital, where planning is believed to be underway on terrorist attacks....
docs.abstract: Senior United States military officials say it is imperative offensive to retake Syrian city of Raqqa begin in coming weeks, in order to prevent suspected plans by Islamic State to initiate terrorist attacks on Western targets, possibly from inside city.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

byline.original: By HELENE COOPER and ERIC SCHMITT

docs.lead_paragraph: Senior military officials said the fight would begin within weeks to retake the de facto ISIS capital, where planning is believed to be underway on terrorist attacks.

headline.main: Hurricane Floods Homeless Housing in Historic St. Augustine
headline.print_headline: Hurricane Floods Homeless Housing in Historic St. Augustine

docs.snippet: Days after Hurricane Matthew sent floodwaters surging through historic St. Augustine, the county's director of homeless services was panicked....

headline.main: Justice Department to Conduct Review of Memphis Police
headline.print_headline: Justice Department to Conduct Review of Memphis Police

docs.snippet: The Justice Department has launched a comprehensive review of the Memphis Police Department, officials said Wednesday, after citizens criticized the department's use of deadly force and its treatment of the black community....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Justice Department has launched a comprehensive review of the Memphis Police Department, officials said Wednesday, after citizens criticized the department's use of deadly force and its treatment of the black community.

headline.main: Mormon School Stops Honor-Code Reviews of Sex Abuse Victims
headline.print_headline: Mormon School Stops Honor-Code Reviews of Sex Abuse Victims

docs.snippet: Students at Brigham Young University who report sexual assault will no longer be investigated for possible violations of the strict honor code that bans drinking and premarital sex, the Mormon-owned school announced Wednesday in a major reversal t...
docs.lead_paragraph: Students at Brigham Young University who report sexual assault will no longer be investigated for possible violations of the strict honor code that bans drinking and premarital sex, the Mormon-owned school announced Wednesday in a major reversal to a practice that drew widespread scrutiny.
